member.name: P:TeklaGeometryExtender.PartProperties.MaxBoundingGlobal
member.summary: Gets the maximum bounding point on the part bounding box. The point is defined in the global workplane settings. The point does not deviate from the actual solid when it's inclined in the global plane.

member.summary: Gets the maximum bounding point on the part bounding box. The point is defined in the current workplane settings. The point does not deviate from the actual solid when it's inclined in the global plane.
